name: HeptaBlox
description: A word game inspired by NY Timesâ€™ Spelling Bee. You need to create as many words as you can from the letters possible, and you must use the center letter in every word you submit. Have a try! Created using React.js.

name: Scrypt
description: A Web 3.0 application  connected to the blockchain, and uses metamask pairing. Allows for interaction with smart contracts, and allows users to send Ethereum through the blockchain network, writing solidity. This was built using React, Solidity, Hardhat for testing, and Alchemy for smart contract deployment.

name: Chatter
description: A Firebase-based chat application, with key highlights being social authentication including Google and Twitter, online statuses, minimal design, image support, sound notifications, and the ability to create multiple rooms. Created using React, Firebase, React Context, Chat Engine, and a REST API. Try it out for yourself!

name: ToDo List Revamped (WIP)
description: A collaborative ToDo app built using full-stack technologies. The backend used a GraphQL API using an Apollo server, NodeJS, and MongoDB. The front-end used React Native. This is a revamp of the original ToDo list created a while back (scroll down!).

name: Tesla App
description: My first React Native project. A replica of the Tesla homepage built for IOS.

name: Hive
description: A social media site using ReactJS, JavaScript, Node, MongoDB, and Express. The back-end was deployed with Heroku and the front-end with Netlify.

name: Tic-Tac-Toe
description: A minigame of Tic-Tac-Toe. This was the first React project I created! The game can be played below but it looks best on desktop (or desktop-mode on mobile)!

name: Google Homepage
description: A concept Google Search homepage created when I first started to code!

name: ToDo List
description: A basic to-do list with limited functionality. This is something I made when testing out various React features for the first time- I'm in the process of revamping this one!
